title: Jelly Belly Dual Ice Shaver at Bed Bath & Beyond
description:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/produ...
Create flavorful icy treats with this ice shaver which uses 85-watts of power to create course and fine texture ice shavings from regular ice cubes. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

asset.author: Bedbathandbeyond

transcripts:
Hi, I'm Nancy from Bed Bath & Beyond, and I'm here to tell you about the Jelly Belly Dual Electric Ice Shaver. This electric ice shaver makes refreshing snow cones and slushes the whole family can enjoy. This party sized machine is double the fun. It comes with two removable syrup dispensers so you can store your unused syrup in the fridge, a removable double cup holder so you can used either snow cone cups or your own cups from home, and a no mess drip tray. Making homemade snow cones and slushes is easy. 

Let's make some now. First, secure the bowl by lining up the outside tabs to the grooves on the machine. Now gently push it into place. Set the machine to make either one or two snow cones by turning the knob on the side of the bowl. Add your ice cubes to the machine. Put the lid on the bowl and as it turns it will lock in place and the machine will automatically turn on. When you're done shaving the ice, turn the lid in the opposite direction and the machine will shut off. Now just add your flavored syrups and enjoy . You can even combine flavors to create your own special treat.

Because the shaved ice is so fine, it immediately absorbs all the flavor giving you a truly intense taste all the way through. This electric ice shaver makes snow cones and slushes using either Jelly Belly's flavored syrups, soda, punch, or fruit juice. The Jelly Belly Dual Electric Ice Shaver is available online and at a Bed Bath & Beyond store near you.
